DTField.Name: CONSIGNEE
DTField.Label: CONSIGNEE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The Client related to the Company.

DTField.Name: STAGINGLANE
DTField.Label: STAGINGLANE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The staging Lane from which Contact orders are shipped.

DTField.Name: PICKUPCONFIRMATIONTYPE
DTField.Label: PICKUPCONFIRMATIONTYPE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The method by which delivery from the Company is confirmed.

DTField.Name: DELIVERYCONFIRMATIONTYPE
DTField.Label: DELIVERYCONFIRMATIONTYPE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The method by which delivery to the Company is confirmed.

DTField.Name: COMPANYGROUP
DTField.Label: COMPANYGROUP
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The group of which the Company is part.

DTField.Name: STATUS
DTField.Label: STATUS
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Determines whether the Company is active or not.

DTField.Name: MIXPICKING
DTField.Label: MIXPICKING
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Determines whether Company inventory may be picked distinctly or not.

DTField.Name: PREFUNLOADINGSIDE
DTField.Label: PREFUNLOADINGSIDE
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The vehicle side from which the Company prefers to unload inventory from.

DTField.Name: DELIVERYCOMMENTS
DTField.Label: DELIVERYCOMMENTS
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Comments regarding the delivery to the Company.

DTField.Name: SERVICETIME
DTField.Label: SERVICETIME
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The time that should be considered for service while at the Companies site.

DTField.Name: DELIVERYNOTELAYOUT
DTField.Label: DELIVERYNOTELAYOUT
DTField.DTFieldHelp: Enables users to determine a specific template for the production of delivery notes for each company.

DTField.Name: DEFAULTCONTACT
DTField.Label: DEFAULTCONTACT
DTField.DTFieldHelp: The default contact that is used for the Company (used for Companies that manage more than one contact).
